page.title: 17TRADE AND VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: THERE IS VERY LITTLE INDUSTRY IN THIS AREA. SPRATTON HAS A GARAGE SITUATED ON THE A5O FROM NORTHAMPTON TO WELFORD. THE MAIN PART OF THE VILLAGE OF SPRATTON CONTAINS THREE SHOPS, A BUTCHERS, A POST OFFICE AND A GROCERS. THE BUTCHER IS FAMOUS FOR HIS PATE AND DELIVERS MEAT IN A 1O-15 MILE RADIUS.THE FIVE FARMS IN THE AREA SUPPLY MOST OF THE EMPLOYMENT. BROOMHILL, A LARGE COUNTRY HOUSE, HAS RECENTLY BEEN CONVERTED TO A LARGE HOTEL AND EMPLOYS SOME LOCAL LABOUR. THE OCCUPANTS OF THE FEW HOUSES AT HOLDENBY ARE EMPLOYED IN HOLDENBY HOUSE OR ON THE ESTATE. THERE IS NO LONGER A VILLAGE SHOP AT HOLDENBY BUT THEY ARE SERVED BY SEVERAL MOBILE SHOPS. MANY PEOPLE REGULARLY DO A BULK BUY IN NORTHAMPTON ON A WEEKLY OR MONTHLY BASIS.
